text: <@U1A9JNB1T>: we are working with our customer on scenario definition within the supply chain. Basically, we will focus on the asset tracking as the use case in HL mentioned first (<https://github.com/hyperledger/hyperledger/wiki/Use-Case-Supply-Chain-Logistics>). After convince the customer and prove the blockchain can really help to reduce their cost. Then we will move to supply chain finance, such as Commercial Paper, after all the financing is needed for each participants in a supply chain.

attachments.title: hyperledger/hyperledger
attachments.text: Hyperledger Project is a new Collaborative Project at The Linux Foundation. The technical community is just getting started and will be adding code to the repository in the coming weeks. Check hype...
